text.emotional: Step seven: When the parsnips have matured into their final and healthy form, harvest them. Overload the harvest directly into a trailer or onto vegetable pallets.
text.silence: {.} step {..} seven {....} when the parsnips have matured into their final {...} and healthy form {...} harvest them {....} overload the harvest {...} directly into a trailer {....} or onto vegetable pallets {...}
